Package se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.pdf.utils

PDF Signature process functions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CMSProcessableInputStream
    Wraps an InputStream into a CMSProcessable object for Bouncy Castle.
    PDFBoxSignatureUtils
    Static utilities for signed PDF documents.
    PDFBoxSignatureUtils.SignedCertRef  
    PDFBoxSignatureUtils.SignedCertRef.SignedCertRefBuilder  
    PDFSigningProcessor
    This class provides a PDF signing processor that provides the basic functionality to use a SignatureInterface implementation to generate PDF signature data.
    PDFSigningProcessor.PDFSigningProcessorBuilder  
    PDFSigningProcessor.Result
    Result object for PDFSigningProcessor.signPdfDocument(PDDocument, PDFBoxSignatureInterface, long, VisibleSignatureImage).
    PDFSigningProcessor.Result.ResultBuilder  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SubjectDnAttribute
    Enumeration of common certificate subject attributes.
